channel.title: Divine Login Problem
channel.description:
I have problem with loging to divine pk i lauched 2 servers but they say Error - failed to decode profile. Contact an admin for help.
maybe they'r guz of i changed 2 things in database because i would be Unable to register GREEN: ADDED RED:REMOVED
`forum_id` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
`killed` text NOT NULL, `killed` int(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',

item.title: Divine Login Problem
item.dc:creator: @SoundTable SoundTable
item.description:
@SoundTable wrote:

then i can’t register
EDIT: go try at http://toxicpk.no-ip.org
EDIT2: Field ‘forum_id’ doesn’t have a default value when i change forum_id to 0 then it says
Field ‘killed’ doesn’t have a default value but here i can’t change value to 0
because its not allowing

DATABASE

Error while executing query
ALTER TABLE `demonik_lsd`.`user_credentials`MODIFY COLUMN `killed` TEXT CHARACTER SET latin1 COLLATE latin1_swedish_ci NOT DEFAULT 0; MYSQL ERROR number 1101 BLOB/TEXT column 'killed' can't have a default value

Sorry Here Might Me Alot Of Mistakes
